title: DONALD JUDD - sans serif - font ID
content:
Looking for an ID on the sans serif used for this DONALD JUDD book cover

Many thanks in advance,  
Danny

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829013128im_/http:/typophile.com/files/DJudd_6693.jpg)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [DJudd.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829013128/http:/typophile.com/files/DJudd.jpg) | 465.12 KB |
author: Danny_Miller

comments.content: You can try an **[ITC Franklin Gothic (Demi Bold)](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829013128/http:/www.findmyfont.com/index.php/fonts/font-preview?fset=Adobe&ffam=ITC%20Franklin%20Gothic%20-%20Demi%20Bold&fid=a73f703426905cea7908e8cccff04ca2&fsize=60&text=DONALD%20JUDD&fit=1)**, probably a bit manually condensed
